English.Text: "They must have been in league with the Pyrphorians!" wails your duped diplomat. Having failed to detect local complicity— rooted either in fear or allegiance— your diplomat insists you sail south along the coast. Your expedition continues diligently for three days in that direction without sighting a single human settlement. "Since you're so fine with words," says the lieutenant to the diplomat in question, "perhaps you should explain our failure to Miss. Hannah Goode!"
